actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to repeal exemptions in the antitrust laws relating to fair trade laws.

summary.text: Repeals, under the Sherman Antitrust Act and the Federal Trade Commission Act, exemptions in the antitrust law relating to fair trade laws (also known as resale price maintenance or quality stabilization laws) which permit agreements prescribing minimum or stipulated prices for the resale of brand-name commodities.

titles.title: A bill to repeal exemptions in the antitrust laws relating to fair trade laws.
